title: Save to S3 Input
description: Use the following form to configure Save to S3:

accessKeyId.title: AWS Key ID
accessKeyId.description: Enter the access key ID for the AWS user

secretAccessKey.title: AWS Secret Access Key
secretAccessKey.description: Enter the secret access key for the AWS user

region.title: AWS region
region.description: Enter the AWS region your S3 bucket is located in

bucket.title: AWS bucket
bucket.description: Enter the name of the S3 bucket to use

format.title: Data format
format.description: The data format to download the dataset in

clean.title: Clean items only
clean.description: Crawler will ignore SSL certificate errors.

datasetOptions.title: Dataset options
datasetOptions.description: An object whose properties will be enumerated and added to the dataset get items API request. See https://apify.com/docs/api/v2#/reference/datasets/item-collection/get-items.

debugLog.title: Debug log
debugLog.description: Debug messages will be included in the log. Use context.log.debug('message') to log your own debug messages.
